commandDescription: Assign a permset to one or more users
permsetlabelFlagDescription: A single Permission Set. Use Label of the Perm set
onbehalfofFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of usernames. if --filter is also specified, this flag is combined in the where clause with an OR
filterFlagDescription:
Analogous to SOQL where clause to pull usernames from Standard User Object. Any queryable field in User Obect can be used.
Examples:

"Profile.Name LIKE 'System Admin%' AND Department = 'IT'
verboseFlagDescription: Output to screen in csv format, defaults to false unless --checkonly flag is set
checkonlyFlagDescription: Just display details, no updates are made, defaults to false.
